reporting-org.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross

title.narrative: ICRC operations by the Jakarta (regional) Delegation(2022 Unaudited)

description.narrative: The ICRC's Jakarta delegation enhances emergency-response capabilities, supports medical care in remote parts of Indonesia, promotes IHL and law-enforcement standards, maintains a dialogue on humanitarian topics across South-East Asia and restores faThe ICRC's Jakarta delegation enhances emergency-response capabilities, supports medical care in remote parts of Indonesia, promotes IHL and law-enforcement standards, maintains a dialogue on humanitarian topics across South-East Asia and restores family links. In Timor Leste, the ICRC is developing the capability of the authorities to identify people who died during the 1975-1999 conflict and to react to large-scale emergencies. We are promoting international humanitarian law within the armed forces and poIn Timor Leste, the ICRC is developing the capability of the authorities to identify people who died during the 1975-1999 conflict and to react to large-scale emergencies. We are promoting international humanitarian law within the armed forces and police and training the Timor Leste Red Cross in community engagement, restoring family links and the management of dead bodies during emergencies.
